Text:
Many thanks! Much appreciated.
It's so tempting to answer the question Maldonado is asking on the cover. I don't suppose it would be too far off topic.
Well, Pastor, it's because you're an aggressive prat, and the only reason you're wearing those Williams overalls is because the oil company PDVSA, owned by the government of Venezuela, paid Wiliams £29,400,000 ($US46,072,740).
That's why!

(Correction - I hate typos)
